create.title: Create new project
create.existing-name-error: A project with that name already exists.

archive.title: Archive project
archive.message: Are you sure you want to archive "{{project}}"? You can restore it later in Projects Plus plugin's setting tab.
archive.notice: Project archived! If you are using Projects across multiple devices and syncing between them, please upgrade to version 1.17.0 or above for all your devices to avoid losing your archived project configurations.

delete.title: Delete project
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{project}}"? This cannot be undone.

default.name: Set as default
default.description: Enable to open this project by default.

datasource.name: Data source
datasource.description: Choose how you want to define which notes to include.

path.name: Path
path.description: Path to the folder you want to manage. Leave empty to use root folder.

tag.name: Tag
tag.description: Include all notes that have this tag.

dataview.name: Use Dataview
dataview.description: Use Dataview to query read-only data instead of using paths.

error.title: Dataview is disabled
error.message: Enable the Dataview plugin to continue using this project.

recursive.name: Include subfolders
recursive.description: Manage notes inside subfolders within the project path.

hierarchy.name: Tag hierarchy
hierarchy.description: Manage notes containing sub-tags of the project target tag.

templates.name: Templates
templates.description: Templates to choose from when you create new notes.

exclude.name: Excluded notes
exclude.description: Notes to exclude even if they would otherwise be part of the project.

newNotesFolder.name: Location for new notes
newNotesFolder.description: Folder where all new notes are placed.

autosave.name: Autosave
autosave.description: Automatically save changes when editing notes. When disabled, a Save button will be shown.

agenda.name: Agenda mode
agenda.description: Choose how the agenda displays tasks and events.

inherit-filters.name: Inherit calendar filters
inherit-filters.description: Apply the same filters as the calendar view

delete.title: Delete archive
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{archive}}"? This cannot be undone.

create.title: Add new view
create.existing-name-error: A view with that name already exists.

delete.title: Delete view
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the view "{{view}}"?

create.title: Create new note
create.name-taken-error: A note with that name already exists.
create.dot-start-error: File name must not start with a dot.

readonly.title: Read-only project
readonly.message: {{project}} is a read-only project. Select another project to create a note.

no-editable-fields.title: No editable fields
no-editable-fields.message: This note has no editable fields.

configure.title: Configure field
configure.existing-name-error: Can't rename to a existing field name.

options.name: Options
options.description: Allows you to auto-complete using predefined values for the field.

time.name: Enable time
time.description: Recognize this field as Date & time.

create.title: Create new field
create.existing-name-error: A field with that name already exists.

options.name: Options
options.description: Allows you to auto-complete using predefined values for the field.

column-width.name: Column width
column-width.description: Width of each column in pixels.

custom-header.name: Customize card header
custom-header.description: Use selected field as the header of cards.

order-sync-field.name: Sync card order with field
order-sync-field.description: Field to store the position of cards in the board.

empty.no-date-field: Select a date field to display events

errors.create-readonly: Cannot create events in read-only projects
errors.date-required: Date field is required to create events

list-editor.color-hint: Sets the left border color for visual identification
list-editor.filters-hint: Date formulas: 'today', 'today+1w', 'sow', 'eom'. DQL-compatible: sow/eow/som/eom/soy/eoy. Operators: 'Is today', 'Is this week', 'Is overdue'.
list-editor.formula-hint: Use functions like AND(), OR(), CONTAINS(), IS_TODAY(). See Help for full reference.

filter-editor.empty: No filters — all records will be shown
filter-editor.date-formula-hint: Formula: today, sow, eom, today+1w, som-1m

card-width.name: Card width
card-width.description: Width of each card in pixels.

toolbar.read-only-desc: You can't create or edit notes in read-only projects.

about.title: About Projects Plus
about.description: Enhanced project management for Obsidian with advanced features.
about.author: Maintainer
about.credits-desc: This is a community-maintained fork of the original Obsidian Projects plugin by Marcus Olsson.
about.support-desc: If you find this plugin useful, consider supporting the development.
about.languages-desc: Available languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, Chinese (automatic detection based on system language)

size-limit.name: Project size limit
size-limit.desc: Avoid accidentally loading too many notes.

link-behavior.name: Link behavior
link-behavior.desc: Determines what happens when you select the link of a note. Press {{modifier}} while selecting link for opposite behavior.

mobile-calendar.name: Mobile calendar view
mobile-calendar.desc: Default calendar view on mobile devices.

animation-behavior.name: Animation Behavior
animation-behavior.desc: Control scrolling animations throughout the plugin

commands.name: Commands
commands.desc: Add commands for your favorite projects and views.

archives.name: Archives
archives.desc: Restore or delete your archived projects.

missingDataview.title: Dataview is disabled
missingDataview.message: Enable the Dataview plugin to continue using this project.

boundary.title: Something went wrong
boundary.message: An error occurred while rendering this component.

hints.column-width: Width of each column in pixels
hints.order-sync-field: Number field to store card positions

hints.card-width: Width of each gallery card in pixels
hints.cover-field: Text field with path to image
hints.include-fields: Select which fields to show on cards

hints.hide-fields: Select which fields to hide in the table
